values.title: Building the Ignition Libraries documentation does not mention that gcc8 is required

content.raw:
Following the documentation in https://ignitionrobotics.org/docs/acropolis/install#building-the-ignition-libraries, on Ubuntu 18.04 the compilation fails with the following error:
~~~
straversaro@iiticublap103:~/src/ignition-workspace$ colcon build
Starting >>> ignition-cmake2
Starting >>> ignition-tools
Finished <<< ignition-tools [0.25s]                                     
[Processing: ignition-cmake2]                                 
Finished <<< ignition-cmake2 [45.7s]                          
Starting >>> ignition-math6
Finished <<< ignition-math6 [6.34s]                        
Starting >>> ignition-common3
Starting >>> ignition-msgs3
Starting >>> sdformat8
--- stderr: sdformat8                                                     
CMake Error at cmake/DefaultCFlags.cmake:67 (message):
  sdformat8 requires g++ 8.0 or greater.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  CMakeLists.txt:177 (include)
---
~~~

It is probably necessary to document that GCC8 should be used instead for compiling Ignition  Acropolis.
content.html:
Following the documentation in https://ignitionrobotics.org/docs/acropolis/install#building-the-ignition-libraries, on Ubuntu 18.04 the compilation fails with the following error:

straversaro@iiticublap103:~/src/ignition-workspace$ colcon build
Starting >>> ignition-cmake2
Starting >>> ignition-tools
Finished <<< ignition-tools [0.25s]                                     
[Processing: ignition-cmake2]                                 
Finished <<< ignition-cmake2 [45.7s]                          
Starting >>> ignition-math6
Finished <<< ignition-math6 [6.34s]                        
Starting >>> ignition-common3
Starting >>> ignition-msgs3
Starting >>> sdformat8
--- stderr: sdformat8                                                     
CMake Error at cmake/DefaultCFlags.cmake:67 (message):
  sdformat8 requires g++ 8.0 or greater.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  CMakeLists.txt:177 (include)
---

It is probably necessary to document that GCC8 should be used instead for compiling Ignition Acropolis.

values.title: Newlines in code blocks are not correctly rendered on the website

content.raw:
On the website, code blocks with newlines are just rendered as a single line without newlines, making difficult to copy and paste the code. 

See for example https://ignitionrobotics.org/docs/acropolis/install#option-1-installation-on-ubuntu-bionic and the corresponding source file #!/ignitionrobotics/docs/annotate/default/acropolis/install.md?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#install.md-98 .
content.html:
On the website, code blocks with newlines are just rendered as a single line without newlines, making difficult to copy and paste the code.

See for example https://ignitionrobotics.org/docs/acropolis/install#option-1-installation-on-ubuntu-bionic and the corresponding source file #!/ignitionrobotics/docs/annotate/default/acropolis/install.md?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#install.md-98 .

content.raw:
macOS Catalina

## Modified headers

I modified some header on my filesystem to be able to compile Ignition-Citadel

‌

* `/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX10.15.sdk/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Headers/ruby/ruby/intern.h`

I apply this path:

‌

```c++
--- intern.h    2019-12-16 18:17:08.000000000 +0100
+++ /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Develo$
@@ -14,6 +14,10 @@
 #ifndef RUBY_INTERN_H
 #define RUBY_INTERN_H 1

+#if __cplusplus > 199711L
+#define register      // Deprecated in C++11.
+#endif  // #if __cplusplus > 199711L
+
 #if defined(__cplusplus)
 extern "C" {
 #if 0
```

‌

* and this other file :``Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX10.15.sdk/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Headers/ruby/ruby/config.h` ``

‌

```
--- config.h    2019-12-16 18:19:13.000000000 +0100
+++ /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Develo$
@@ -410,6 +410,6 @@
 #define RUBY_PLATFORM_CPU "x86_64"
 #endif /* defined __x86_64__ &&! defined RUBY_PLATFORM_CPU */
 #define RUBY_PLATFORM_OS "darwin19"
-#define RUBY_ARCH"universal-"RUBY_PLATFORM_OS
-#define RUBY_PLATFORM"universal."RUBY_PLATFORM_CPU"-"RUBY_PLATFORM_OS
+#define RUBY_ARCH "universal-" RUBY_PLATFORM_OS
+#define RUBY_PLATFORM "universal." RUBY_PLATFORM_CPU "-" RUBY_PLATFORM_OS
 #endif /* INCLUDE_RUBY_CONFIG_H */
```

‌

## Compile

```
colcon build --merge-install --cmake-args -DUSE_INTERNAL_URDF=True
```

‌

## Running

But when I try to run some of the examples. I see big error traces:

‌

```shell
ign gazebo -v 3 lights.sdf
[Msg] Ignition Gazebo GUI    v3.0.0
[Msg] Ignition Gazebo Server v3.0.0
[Msg] Loading SDF world file[/Users/ahcorde/ignition/install/share/ignition/ignition-gazebo3/worlds/lights.sdf].
The process has forked and you cannot use this CoreFoundation functionality safely. You MUST exec().
Break on __THE_PROCESS_HAS_FORKED_AND_YOU_CANNOT_USE_THIS_COREFOUNDATION_FUNCTIONALITY___YOU_MUST_EXEC__() to debug.
/Users/ahcorde/ignition/install/lib/ruby/ignition/cmdgazebo3.rb:312: [BUG] Segmentation fault at 0x0000000000000008
ruby 2.6.3p62 (2019-04-16 revision 67580) [universal.x86_64-darwin19]

Don't forget to include the above Crash Report log file in bug reports.     

-- Control frame information -----------------------------------------------

[Msg] Serving full state on [/world/lights/state]
[Msg] Publishing scene information on [/world/lights/scene/info]
[Msg] Publishing entity deletions on [/world/lights/scene/deletion]
[Msg] Publishing state changes on [/world/lights/state]
[Msg] Publishing pose messages on [/world/lights/pose/info]
[Msg] Publishing dynamic pose messages on [/world/lights/dynamic_pose/info]
Escalating to SIGKILL on [Ignition Gazebo Server]
```

‌
content.html:
macOS Catalina

Modified headers

I modified some header on my filesystem to be able to compile Ignition-Citadel

‌

  • /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX10.15.sdk/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Headers/ruby/ruby/intern.h

I apply this path:

‌

--- intern.h    2019-12-16 18:17:08.000000000 +0100
+++ /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Develo$
@@ -14,6 +14,10 @@
 #ifndef RUBY_INTERN_H
 #define RUBY_INTERN_H 1

+#if __cplusplus > 199711L
+#define register      // Deprecated in C++11.
+#endif  // #if __cplusplus > 199711L
+
 #if defined(__cplusplus)
 extern "C" {
 #if 0

‌

  • and this other file :Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX10.15.sdk/System/Library/Frameworks/Ruby.framework/Headers/ruby/ruby/config.h`

‌

--- config.h    2019-12-16 18:19:13.000000000 +0100
+++ /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Develo$
@@ -410,6 +410,6 @@
 #define RUBY_PLATFORM_CPU "x86_64"
 #endif /* defined __x86_64__ &&! defined RUBY_PLATFORM_CPU */
 #define RUBY_PLATFORM_OS "darwin19"
-#define RUBY_ARCH"universal-"RUBY_PLATFORM_OS
-#define RUBY_PLATFORM"universal."RUBY_PLATFORM_CPU"-"RUBY_PLATFORM_OS
+#define RUBY_ARCH "universal-" RUBY_PLATFORM_OS
+#define RUBY_PLATFORM "universal." RUBY_PLATFORM_CPU "-" RUBY_PLATFORM_OS
 #endif /* INCLUDE_RUBY_CONFIG_H */

‌

Compile

colcon build --merge-install --cmake-args -DUSE_INTERNAL_URDF=True

‌

Running

But when I try to run some of the examples. I see big error traces:

‌

ign gazebo -v 3 lights.sdf

values.title: "Latest installation tutorial" link goes to Acropolis

content.raw:
This section in the release-agnostic Get Started guide: [https://ignitionrobotics.org/docs/all/getstarted#step-1-install](https://ignitionrobotics.org/docs/all/getstarted#step-1-install)

I’m not sure how /docs/**latest**/install is configured: [#!/ignitionrobotics/docs/annotate/default/get\_started.md?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#get\_started.md-14](#!/ignitionrobotics/docs/annotate/default/get_started.md?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#get_started.md-14)

Add links to the changelog of each library for each Ignition release on the `release-features.md` page.
Need to wait until we migrate away from bitbucket.

content.raw:
I’m trying to install ignition-citadel in a docker container. Running the installation-commands leads to an error that the dependent package “libignition-launch2-dev” is not going to be installed. 

Here the relevant part of the output: 

`…`

`Step 13/20 : RUN sudo apt-get install -y ignition-citadel`  
`---> Running in 086e9fbb3a4c`  
`Reading package lists...`  
`Building dependency tree...`  
`Reading state information...`  
`Some packages could not be installed. This may mean that you have`  
`requested an impossible situation or if you are using the unstable`  
`distribution that some required packages have not yet been created`  
`or been moved out of Incoming.`
